title: Gold 3 support main looking for a duo.
body:
Hey guys how are you. I've been playing since August last year and have been climbing pretty decently :) At the moment I am gold 3 76 Lp. Recently i have been winning 60% of my games as a support. I've just started playing more ranked again so I'm looking to hit Platinum in less than 7 days! Anyone who wants to duo (Gold-plat) let me know. I have been climbing quickly lately as I am getting coached by an extremely amazing guy who has helped me improve so much so i definitely feel like I could get plat just would love someone to help quicken the process :)
I main Zyra, Nami, Karma, Janna and Leona so I feel like i have a pretty good support champion pool. :) 
IGN: L ILLUMINAMI L

replies.body: Hi im gold 5 so im not like you but I think my jinx is quite good gonna add you <3
